pkgmetadata.longdescription: Lightweight Framework for Orchestrating Multi-Agent Large Language Models // Provides tools for creating agents with persistent state using R6 classes https://cran.r-project.org/package=R6 and the 'ellmer' package https://cran.r-project.org/package=ellmer. Tracks prompts, messages, and agent metadata for reproducible, multi-turn large language model sessions.
